luxury_grand.notes: LG lives under tier 'Luxury' (luxury_grand=true). Eligibility is coarse: LG is blocked only for the Strength/Resilience anchor (grief/recovery). All other anchors are eligible; weighting/budget nudges (e.g., softer for Apology/Farewell; boost for Valentine; opt-in via 'grand' intent) are handled elsewhere (edge registers / weights), not here.
